summary: Tremors is an American science fiction comedy horror movie.
full_text: A tremor is an involuntary, somewhat rhythmic, muscle contraction and relaxation involving oscillations or twitching movements of one or more body parts. It is the most common of all involuntary movements and can affect the hands, arms, eyes, face, head, vocal folds, trunk, and legs. Most tremors occur in the hands. In some people, a tremor is a symptom of another neurological disorder. A very common tremor is the chattering of teeth, usually induced by cold temperatures or by fear.
title: Tremors
